Package anydev

Class Row

java.lang.Object
anydev.Row
public class Row extends Object
Row: Holds all data from a model-DB table's row NOTE: It is named with the POJO_ prefix because it should not be accessed directly This mimics a normal POJO for a data-table row but is generic (so you never need to write another POJO) NOTE: Any Row is always tied to a Table that enforces the same column structure This version implements a Builder Pattern for easier and more readable construction. Usage: Row.with(column1, data1).with(column2, data2).create();
Since:
v1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • with

      public static Row.Builder with(Column column, Object dataItem)
      Start creating a new Row of data by chaining with(...) for each column
      Parameters:
      column - The first column to add data for
      dataItem - The data item for the first column.

    • createFullRow

      public static void createFullRow(LinkedHashMap<Column,Object> rowData, Table table)
      Create a fully-formed Row by providing all data upfront This bypasses the builder pattern and is useful when you already have all row data in a map. Also adds this row to given table
      Parameters:
      initialData - The LinkedHashMap containing all column-data pairs for the new Row.
      table - for which table is this row? Must match structurally (i.e. by columns!). Row will be added to this table

    • getTable

      public Table getTable()
      Returns:
      the table this row belongs to

    • get

      public Object get(Column column)
      Parameters:
      column - what column to get data for
      Returns:
      data object stored in this row for given column. Null if none stored (or actually stored null)

    • getString

      public String getString(Column column)
      Parameters:
      column - what column to get data for. Must be of type Column.Type.STRING
      Returns:
      String stored in this row for given column. Null if none stored for given column, column is not String or actually stored null-String

    • getBoolean

      public Boolean getBoolean(Column column)
      Parameters:
      column - what column to get data for. Must be of type Column.Type.BOOLEAN
      Returns:
      Boolean stored in this row for given column. Null if none stored for given column, column is not a boolean or actually stored null

    • getInt

      public Integer getInt(Column column)
      Parameters:
      column - what column to get data for. Must be of type Column.Type.INTEGER
      Returns:
      Integer stored in this row for given column. Null if none stored for given column, column is not an Integer or actually stored null

    • getColumns

      public LinkedList<Column> getColumns()
      Returns:
